text.p: These are some of the leading stories in Syrian newspapers on Monday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.

- Damascus Declaration foreign ministers wrap up Cairo talks with emphasis on just peace, balanced security. Syrian Foreign Minister Shara discusses Middle East process with Egyptian President Mubarak.
- President Mubarak briefed on talks between Israel and Palestinians. Israeli premier Netanyahu says Jews to stay in West Bank town of Hebron for ever.
- Israeli Infrastructure Minister Sharon stresses continued settlement policy in Golan Heights.
- Israeli ports, airports hit by strike.
- Foreign Minister Shara says after meeting President Mubarak that Israel is escalating tension in the region.
- Arab foreign ministers reiterate support for Syria and Lebanon against Israeli threats and call for full Israeli withdrawal from the Golan.
- Oman says will review all contacts with Israel.
